p: The weekly provincial-level weather data that was used in this study are from the Thai Meteorological Department. Eight weather parameters are considered in each model: average temperature ( avp), maximum temperature ( maxt), minimum temperature ( mint), average humidity ( avh), precipitation ( rain), vaporization ( vapor), wind direction ( dwind), and wind power ( pwind). Fig 6 shows plots of weekly weather data for Chiang Mai from January 2001 to December 2014.
